attributes.action: Scrap the Manchester ID card pilot study
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we pay for something we dont need or want.
The government needs to go and pick on another city.(we did the conjestion pilot study) or better still carbosh the whole ID system. Most honest british citizens have passports(make these more sufficient instead and driving licences. most terrorists can quite easily get hold of such things.
This is just a money making beaurocratic exercise.
If you really need to have an ID system it has to be given free of charge to make it valid and useable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
